title: Do we get 2014 season reward during the pre season?
body: I wasnt playing ranked before the 2014 season, and now im gold in the pre season, can I still get the 2014 seasonal rewards?

replies.body: sadly no. I too hit gold in preseason and i cri evi tym cuz no borderino 1 lyk 1 praya
You get a pat on the back!

Ummm... No... If you wanted to get the 2014 season ranked rewards you need to have played in the 2014 season of ranked... Didn't think this needed to be said... Also, rewards have already been given out.
